name: District Madam Shadow
description:
Dice with Madam Shadow
When you win, you'll open a picture of a savage.

Play dice with charming Madam Shadow.
The picture of a delightful savage girl will pop up upon a win.

- Long and interesting match.
- Lot of levels
- Dynamic change of the background in the gaming window.
- Pleasant way to spend time

System Requirements:
- Android 4.0 or above

Rules of the game:

Bet by pressing a coin.
Choose a cube side.
Press the Game button

To win the level leave Madam Shadow without any money.
